actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Reported to House from the Committee on Foreign Affairs, H. Rept. 93-1241.
Measure passed House, amended, roll call #513 (330-43).
Measure laid on table in House, S. 3473 passed in lieu.

official_title: A bill to authorize appropriations for the Department of State.
short_title: Department of State Appropriations Authorization Act

summary.text: Department of State Appropriations Authorization Act - Authorizes appropriations for the Department of State for fiscal year 1975. States that the Secretary of State may provide for payment of a gratuity to the surviving dependents of any Foreign Service employee who dies as a result of injuries sustained in the performance of duties outside the United States in an amount equal to one year's salary at the time of death.

titles.title: Department of State Appropriations Authorization Act
A bill to authorize appropriations for the Department of State.
